entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 10:55 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
